name: visual-changelog
description: Visualize a changelog from an open-source project in your browser

scripts.build-unified: npx browserify node_modules/unified/index.js -s unified | uglifyjs -c > src/js/lib/unified.min.js
scripts.build-remark-parse: npx browserify node_modules/remark-parse/index.js -s markdown | uglifyjs -c > src/js/lib/remark-parse.min.js
scripts.build-remark-html: npx browserify node_modules/remark-html/index.js -s markdownhtml | uglifyjs -c > src/js/lib/remark-html.min.js
scripts.build-libs: npm run build-unified && npm run build-remark-parse && npm run build-remark-html
scripts.prepare-build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/js
scripts.build-index: npx useref src/index.html dist/ && npm run build-html-es6
scripts.build-app-js: npx babel src/js/app.js --out-file dist/js/app.js && npx uglifyjs dist/js/app.js -o dist/js/app.js
scripts.build-app-js-es6: cp src/js/app.js dist/js/app.js && npx uglifyjs dist/js/app.js -o dist/js/app-es6.js
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/data dist && cp -r src/images dist && cp src/css/app.css dist/css && cp src/js/app.js dist/js && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run prepare-build && npm run copy-assets && npm run build-index && npm run build-vendor-css && npm run build-vendor-js && npm run build-app-css && npm run build-app-js-es6 && npm run build-app-js && npm run build-sw

author: Vincent Ogloblinsky
